name: Blaziken ex
author: Hikaru Koike

attacks.name: Blaze Kick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 30 damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Volcanic Ash
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy attached to Blaziken ex and then choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
